name: Drone Game Prototype
description:
Introduction:

A game made for a university assignment. The aim of the assignment was to create a third person shooter mini game using C++ and Unreal, there was a list of 26 mechanics/features to implement.

The game as 5 levels that get harder as you go along. Save game hasn't been implemented yet, every time you die you restart to level one. There is a level selection for those that don't wish to keep going back to the beginning.

Controls:

W: Forward S: Backwards

A: Left D: Right

E: Up Q: Down

Left Mouse: Fire/Shoot
